thread.title: Bruce Allen
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Bruce Allen

author: Bruce Allen
title: Bruce Allen
text:
I appreciated every aspect of my transaction with American Frame.Your product is first rate, your packaging was excellent and your shipping was extremely efficient and I received the package ahead of schedule promise.
i highly recommend American Frame as the "go-to" source for custom picture framing and for the components related to it.
